title: Cool Cool Bye
synopsis: Two brothers are riding around on their hover bikes, when suddenly a giant metal fortress gets in their way. After a brief battle, the duo manages to gravely wound the fortress. It retreats and dumps our heroic pair in a wasteland.
staff: [['Kogawa, Tomonori', ['Director', ' Script', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design', ' Creator']], ['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Terahigashi, Katsumi', ['Key Animation']], ['Kubooka, Toshiyuki', ['Key Animation']]]
